tender.title: Construction of road from Bhur Basti village to Selekaguri Daily Market via Saraguri and North Korpaguri with CD works (Length-10.37 Km) in Chirang District, Assam under CMs Goodwill Project in BTC area for the year 2023-24.TN-26-97
